UNAPOLOGETICALLY FLORIDA
Copperpoint Brewing was founded in 2014 in Boynton Beach.
We have enjoyed growth as an independent brewery with our home state firmly at the forefront of thought. We believe that being local is more than just an address and strive to create high quality and enjoyable beers for those across the Sunshine State while also remembering our commitment to keeping our wild state beautiful and thriving.
Deliberate Growth
Growing wildly without any rhyme or reason never leads to success and that is a key to our business. Florida, our home, is our number one priority to build our brewery.
While the old saying goes â€œnever say neverâ€ we wouldnâ€™t hold our breath on seeing Copperpoint beer outside of our state anytime soon. People down here are really thirsty.
True To Our Principles
As we have grown, we still have the same high level of standards that we started with on day one.
Buy the best North American made equipment, buy the best brewing ingredients available, take care of our natural state and maintain a happy company culture to make the best beer possible.
It is very important to us to know where our equipment and ingredients come from, and also to maintain relationships with those producers. We are proud to go the extra mile.
Only the Best Ingredients:
Water
We only use reverse osmosis water for all the brewing.
Hops
We maintain close relationships with hop farmers in the Pacific Northwest.
Malt
We source the finest malts produced for each one of our beers.
Spices
We use Florida grown orange peels.
Coffee
We source single origin Guatemala Antigua coffee from local roasters to use in our coffee beers.
Time
We let each beer take as much time as it needs to be great.
We are happy to share our beers and our story with you.
Contact us for more information about our processes or to inquire about distribution.
Contact Us
There's Always Something Brewing.
Sign up for beer release updates and future event information. We promise not to share your info.
